bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a hu chou 胡臭 , barbarian stench, with moisture in one’s armpit, soles of the feet, palms of the hands, and intimate regions releasing a distinct odor as major sign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：胡臭：有體臭，腋臭，漏 臭 , “Barbarian stench includes body stench, armpit stench, and leakage stench ”. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 and other works call this lou ye 漏腋 , leaking armpit. Lou chuang 瘺瘡 , fistula sores [26]
Alternative Names chuang lou 瘡瘺 , fistula.

Pathological Condition identical with lou 瘺 , fistula. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry kun bu 昆布：主十二種水腫， 癭瘤聚結氣，瘺瘡 , “It controls the twelve types of edematose swelling, goiter tumor with collected bound qi, and fistula sores ”.
